title: Any good General Chemistry books for general chemistry olympiads or local chemistry olympiads like ACS Olympiad Exams? The ACS Exams don't show how nor explain their answers. - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a boatload of general chemistry books on the market. Most any you find available will do the trick. But I don’t know of any that are specifically geared toward the ACS Olympiad.
